meanings.definition: A type of snuff made from fermented tobacco leaves.
meanings.sent1: He sneezed after trying the maccoboy snuff.
meanings.sent2: The old man enjoyed the maccoboy snuff in his pipe.
meanings.sent3: The maccoboy snuff made his nose tickle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The maccoboy snuff transported him to memories of his youth.
meanings.sent5: The scent of maccoboy snuff lingered in the room.

meanings.definition: A fragrant powder used in perfumes and soaps.
meanings.sent1: She added a hint of maccoboy to her homemade soap.
meanings.sent2: The perfume contained a touch of maccoboy for a floral scent.
meanings.sent3: The maccoboy powder gave the soap a delightful aroma.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was like a bouquet of flowers with maccoboy as the centerpiece.
meanings.sent5: The maccoboy fragrance filled the room with a sweet smell.
